Holy cow!! Yeah..pretty cool is an understatement!!! LOL!! Pretty fricken a=
wesome!!!

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Misty 
  To: EVP-ITC@yah=
oogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, July 09, 2009 6:05 PM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] =
Re: Some great EVP





  Nope nobody around but there were people a few bl=
ocks away joining in the city fireworks celebration display. Couldnt hear a=
ny of them just their fireworks popping noises. Sounds like they are right =
outside in my yard with me but there was nobody around. And no loud voices =
until I spoke just the one that seems to modify the fireworks sounds. Once =
I spoke they were everywhere all around my voice and overlaying. Pretty coo=
l. 

  Misty
  --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "April Abercrombie" <april@.=
..> wrote:
  >
  > There was no one else in the yard with you?? Not even in=
 adjacent yards or something??
  > 
  > I clearly hear a female speaking.
 =
 > 
  > ----- Original Message ----- 
  > From: Misty Dawn 
  > To: EVP-ITC=
@yahoogroups.com 
  > Sent: Thursday, July 09, 2009 5:24 PM
  > Subject: [E=
VP-ITC] Some great EVP
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > I have uploaded a few o=
f my recent evp recorded on my olympus handheld from my circle group meetin=
g we held when Keith Clark came down to visit us. It was great to meet him =
and Deborah Preece after knowing them both for so long online! They are bot=
h as passionate about this subject as I am.
  > 
  > I also uploaded some f=
antastic evp I recorded on the 4th of July out in my yard alone (if one is =
ever really alone LOL I think the voices contradict that statement). Almost=
 all voices were quite loud and clear for my ears and required no filter or=
 enhancement. You can listen to them here:
  > 
  > http://www.esnips.com/w=
eb/NewEVPVoices
  > 
  > Enjoy!
  > Misty
  >
